titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Lelan Flor Sillin papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Alina Borja and Jackson Shumway

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2016-07-14T09:33-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: July 14, 2016: Revised to add offsite storage notes July 7, 2015: Intellectual arrangement and series based on folder titles created in AT by Sarah Patton. July 10, 2014: Added through box 104 by Jack Shumway. June 3, 2014: Added through box 92 by Alina Borja.

did.abstract: Speeches and writings, correspondence, minutes, reports, studies, manuals, and meeting materials relating to the electric and nuclear power industries and to environmental and energy policy in the United States, especially to activities of the Institute of Nuclear Power Operations, Northeast Utilities, Atomic Industrial Forum, Inc., and the Electric Power Research Institute.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p:
Collection stored off site; a minimum of two days notice is required for use. Boxes may be requested through Stanford's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/
The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Lelan Flor Sillin papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1999.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Lelan Flor Sillin was the chief executive officer and chairman of the board for Northeast Utilities from 1961 to 1983, and director and chairman for the Institute of Nuclear Power Operations from 1980 to 1985.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Speeches and writings, correspondence, minutes, reports, studies, manuals, and meeting materials relating to the electric and nuclear power industries and to environmental and energy policy in the United States, as well as to activities of the Institute of Nuclear Power Operations, Northeast Utilities, Atomic Industrial Forum, Inc., and the Electric Power Research Institute.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: A sketch of Lelan F. Sillin that was used in a publication can be found in the January of 1968 folder (35 : 9).

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: For the most part these speeches were given while Sillin was the president of Northeast Utilities to fellow board members, bankers, lawyers, and colleagues. The speeches generally pertained to energy and the environment.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Most of these publications and reports involve the environment or the utilities industry and the environment. They are published by various organizations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: The Action Papers are numbered and dated, though not always correspondingly. The papers are in numerical order although the series is not complete and many papers are missing.
